Package application.routing.heuristic

Class SimplePollutionHeuristic

java.lang.Object
application.routing.heuristic.SimplePollutionHeuristic
All Implemented Interfaces:
RoutingHeuristic
public class SimplePollutionHeuristic
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoutingHeuristic
A simple routing heuristic which also takes the pollution over a given connection into account.
